Privacy Policy

Last Updated: January 14, 2026

1. Information We Collect

1.1 Information You Provide

  • Email address (when you subscribe to our newsletter)
  • Contact information (when you reach out to us)
  • Any information you voluntarily provide

1.2 Automatically Collected Information

  • IP address
  • Browser type and version
  • Operating system
  • Referring website
  • Pages viewed and time spent
  • Device information

2. How We Use Your Information

  • To provide and maintain our website
  • To send you newsletters and updates (with your consent)
  • To respond to your inquiries
  • To analyze website usage and improve our content
  • To display relevant advertisements
  • To comply with legal obligations

3. Third-Party Services

3.1 Google AdSense

We use Google AdSense to display advertisements. Google may use cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites.

3.2 Google Analytics

We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic. Google may collect data about your usage patterns.

3.3 Third-Party Links

Our website contains links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. Please review their privacy policies.

4. Cookies and Web Beacons

We use cookies and similar technologies to:

  • Remember your preferences
  • Understand user behavior
  • Improve website performance
  • Display relevant advertisements

You can control cookies through your browser settings.

5. Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

6. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access your personal information
  • Correct inaccurate information
  • Request deletion of your information
  • Opt-out of marketing communications
  • Object to processing of your data

7. Children's Privacy

Our website is not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect information from children under 16.

8. International Data Transfers

Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.

9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

10. Contact Us

If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us:

  • Email: privacy@agenticaitools2026.com
  • Website: https://agenticaitools2026.vercel.app

This privacy policy was last updated on January 14, 2026.
